DOC.brief_summary: This research study study identification de novo Fanconi anemia young patient newly diagnose acute myeloid leukemia . Studying sample tissue patient cancer laboratory may help doctor identify learn biomarkers relate Fanconi anemia patient acute myeloid leukemia .
DOC.brief_title: Identification de Novo Fanconi Anemia Younger Patients With Newly Diagnosed Acute Myeloid Leukemia
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . Identify child newly diagnose acute myeloid leukemia ( AML ) treat COG-2961 COG-AAML03P1 high risk de novo Fanconi anemia . II . Procure diagnostic sample COG AML Biology Repository identify Fanconi anemia patient use western blot technique . OUTLINE : Previously collect cryopreserved cell analyze via western blot identify patient Fanconi anemia .
DOC.criteria: Treated COG2961 COGAAML03P1 At high risk Fanconi anemia , define meet one follow group clinical criterion : Group 1 : Prolonged neutropenia induction , severe regimenrelated toxicity ( mucositis , venoocclusive disease , endorgan damage ) Group 2 : Early nonrelapse death ( induction , consolidation ) Group 3 : Smallforweight , secondary malignancy
